newsitem.title: USA: Informix names Alan Henricks new CFO.
newsitem.headline: Informix names Alan Henricks new CFO.

text.p: Informix Software Inc said on Monday it has named Alan Henricks as executive vice president and chief financial officer, succeeding Howard Graham who announced his intention to resign back in August.

Henricks will join Informix from Documentum Inc where he was also chief financial officer. Duties at Informix will include all financial management including treasury, investor relations, control, audit, and operations.
He has 22 years of financial management experience in the information technology industry. He received degrees from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Stanford University.
